name: Squid Game The Pixel Platformer (lots WIP)
name_original: Squid Game The Pixel Platformer (lots WIP)
description:
Lobby Room only. this is a brand new project so dont expect loads the game well be finished in a couple months of work but this is its current stage. to run the game you must download Game maker 2 from yoyo games and run it with that!  we also have a discord server https://discord.gg/qDnHEwBTyu if you would like to help out on this game please DM "Shrimpex" on the discord server thank you



The game well run on any machine that can run Gamemaker 2 

There is 2 versions of gamemaker 2 a free one and a paid one you use either
